jpo
Class ThumbnailQueueRequest

java.lang.Object
  jpo.ThumbnailQueueRequest
public class ThumbnailQueueRequest
extends java.lang.Object

Object that holds the references to the Thumbnail and the priority with which the request was submitted

          returns whether the rebuilding of the thumbnail must be forced or whether an available cached thumbnail will suffice.

Field Detail

private boolean force
Constructor Detail

ThumbnailQueueRequest

ThumbnailQueueRequest(Thumbnail thumb,
                      int priority,
                      boolean force)
Constructs a ThumbnailQueueRequest object

Parameters:
thumb - The Thumbnail object for which the thumbnail is to be created
priority - The priority with which the thumbnail is to be created Possible values are ThumbnailCreationQueue.HIGH_PRIORITY ThumbnailCreationQueue.MEDIUM_PRIORITY and ThumbnailCreationQueue.LOW_PRIORITY
force - set to true if the Thubnail must be read from source if set to false it is permissible to just reload the cached Thumbnail.
Method Detail

getThumbnail

public Thumbnail getThumbnail()

getPriority

public int getPriority()

getForce

public boolean getForce()
returns whether the rebuilding of the thumbnail must be forced or whether an available cached thumbnail will suffice.
